Project_Details.about: Adharsh’s terminal-inspired portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. It features a retro CLI interface with typing animations, blinking cursor, and responsive design. Showcases skills, projects, and contact info in a unique, nostalgic way. -exactly a terminal
A responsive clone of Linear.app using HTML and CSS. Designed to closely mirror the original layout and styling.

A frontend clone of Dribbble built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include a responsive grid layout, interactive shot previews, category filters, and click-based modals—designed to mimic Dribbble’s user experience.
A modern React-based recreation of Porsche’s homepage UI with responsive layout and animations.

allProjects.about: A TypeScript + React-based Amazon UI clone with modular components, routing, and responsive design. Built for frontend practice and UI replication.
A modern React-based recreation of Porsche’s homepage UI with responsive layout and animations.
A responsive clone of Linear.app using HTML and CSS. Designed to closely mirror the original layout and styling.

A frontend clone of Dribbble built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include a responsive grid layout, interactive shot previews, category filters, and click-based modals—designed to mimic Dribbble’s user experience.
A responsive frontend replica of the DailyObjects e-commerce website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
A static responsive replica of Airbnb's homepage built with HTML and CSS. It focuses on layout structure and UI matching without interactivity.
A static responsive layout of UberEats built with pure HTML and CSS. This project mimics the look and feel of the homepage.
A visually aligned clone of Spotify's landing page created with only HTML and CSS. No functionality, focused purely on layout.
A fully responsive HTML and CSS clone of DoorDash’s homepage UI layout, styled to closely match the original.

Adharsh’s terminal-inspired portfolio built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. It features a retro CLI interface with typing animations, blinking cursor, and responsive design. Showcases skills, projects, and contact info in a unique, nostalgic way. -exactly a terminal
